attributes.action: Stop Privately Owned Banks from Fractional Reserve Lending
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The run on the banks has been caused by Banks indulging in fractional reserve lending and off-balance sheet leverage of loans (securitisation and capitlisation). Let us reserve these rights for an independent Nationalised Bank and use the profit on loans to offset taxes. Details of the proposal can be found at http://www.dingoes.org.uk/forum-view.php?thread=19.
